story:
MY STORY

(Excerpt from Positive Choices = Positive Behavior: Choices That Affect Your Character, Life, and Relationships)

INTRODUCTION 


ACKNOWLEDGING MY PERSONAL CHOICES

Something snapped within me! I felt extremely angry, broken, exhausted, frustrated, and scared. After more than 40 years of being a victim and taking abuse from my family and husband, I finally came to a point where I had had enough!  I needed a break!  Hadn't I suffered enough?  Something had to change—soon! I cried out in desperation, “Please God, help me! Someone please help me! I’m so tired of being abused, especially by the people who are supposed to love me. I need some serious help with my situation, God. I know You’ve always been there for me and have my best interests at heart. Would You please show me how to make my life better? I’ll do whatever it takes, God. Just please help me! Thank you!” 

A few days later my answer came to me as an “aha” moment: I can react and respond either negatively or positively to people or situations. The choice is mine. Wow! This “aha” moment triggered something deep within my soul. It was like a switch that instantly turned my negative, oppressive outlook about my life into a positive, promising one. I no longer felt totally overwhelmed with the painful emotions concerning my husband, family members, other people, and myself. I acknowledged that we all have the power of free will. I felt empowered to seize the moment and take control of my life. This was the crucial turning point in my life that prepared me to answer the questions of how and why I reacted and responded negatively to people. This turning point also helped me realize why I remained angry and bitter with these people who had offended me during the course of my lifetime.


ADDRESSING MY PERSONAL CHOICES

Besides feeling angry with, fearful of, and neglected by my husband, family members, and certain other people, I felt powerless, unacceptable, unforgivable, unloved, unwanted, and unworthy. Taking positive action and addressing my personal choices,  I recognized the significance of my negative and positive reactions (with body language) and responses (with words) to people in various situations. Desiring to make significant improvements in my life, I wrote regularly in a journal about my negative reactions and responses in respect to anger, criticism, fear, forgiveness, love, personal power, rejection, and relationships. I analyzed the how and why of my past negative reactions and responses plus looked at my choices from other people’s point-of-view. I finally understood how my destructive behavioral patterns caused the unfavorable outcomes of damaging my character, harming my quality of life, and weakening my relationships. It was time for me to take responsibility for the numerous negative choices I had made. After I started making more positive choices, I found that I was able to put the past behind me, heal my emotional wounds, and move forward with my life.

Exhibiting courage, having an attitude of gratitude, and maintaining a sense of humor have helped me behave toward people and situations in a positive, reasonable, and respectful manner. I have confronted and conquered my fears, managed my anger properly, and supported others. I now accept, forgive, and love myself and others, in addition to giving love to others and receiving love from them. My new constructive practice of positive behavior has produced the favorable outcomes of enhancing my character, improving my quality of life, and strengthening my relationships.

My life-changing “aha” moment and incredible journey of transformation, in conjunction with drawing on my experiences, common sense, empathy, life lessons, observations, and wisdom, serve as the basis for Positive Choices = Positive Behavior: Choices that Affect Your Character, Life, and Relationships. I’m not a mental health professional, nor do I have a degree in communication, counseling, or psychology. What I do know for sure is that my life purpose is to serve others through communication. As an author, a mentor, and a speaker, my mission is:

•  To plant the seeds of awareness in you about your negative and positive choices

•  To prompt you to work through the consequences from your past reactions and responses and to make more positive choices on a daily basis

•  To suggest helpful, practical ways for you to enhance your character, to improve your quality of life, and to strengthen your relationships

Within this self-help book, I share a few of my negative and positive choices in each chapter along with the valuable life lessons I’ve learned from them. If I, an average individual, can enhance my character, improve my quality of life, and strengthen my relationships as a result of making more positive choices on a daily basis, you can too. My intention is to be your mentor and inspire you to work through your own personal issues in a constructive manner. In doing so, this can pave the way for you to heal your emotional wounds regarding other people’s habitual offensive behavior toward you, as well as your destructive reactions and responses toward them. Deciding to accept and forgive yourself and others can become a reality if that’s what you truly want. As a means of encouragement during your journey of transformation, I will provide you with some tools for confronting and conquering your fears, managing your anger properly, and supporting others. In addition, it is my hope to help you deal with your relationships so you can open your heart to loving yourself and others unconditionally. Together you and I can make a positive difference in this world! Are you interested? Read on.


ASSESSING YOUR PERSONAL CHOICES

Positive Choices = Positive Behavior has two objectives. First, examine your negative reactions and responses to others in general. Second, explore how you can make more positive choices and behave more positively toward people instead. This self-help book covers topics relating to your anger, criticism and support, fear, forgiveness, love, personal power, rejection and acceptance, and relationships. It’s my desire to encourage you in each chapter so you will feel empowered to make the commitment to enhance your character, improve your quality of life, and strengthen your relationships.

The vast majority of this self-help book is about you and for you. Use your own “aha” moments, common sense, life experiences, logic, and wisdom to assess your personal choices and to learn more about your behavior. While working through this workbook, you may find yourself at times basing your reactions and responses on your feelings. Sometimes you may base them on your logic. Neither method is “right,” nor “wrong.” The many “aha” moments you may experience as you read through this book could be felt on either an emotional or intellectual level.


CHALLENGING YOUR PERSONAL CHOICES

Ask yourself how you feel or what you think when someone reacts and responds negatively to another person or even to you. Would it be a wise move on your part to start behaving in a more positive manner toward everyone? Imagine how making more good choices on a daily basis could produce more favorable outcomes in your life. Are you ready to do the necessary work to become a stronger emotional, intellectual, and spiritual individual than you ever imaged you could be? Millions of people around the world have done this. Yes, you can do this too! I’m right here to assist and to motivate you. How about we do this together? Today, make positive choices! 


AWARD WINNER

Positive Choices = Positive Behavior is a Bronze medal winner in the motivational category in the 2013 Readers’ Favorite contest out of six finalists. Click on their link http://readersfavorite.com/2013-award-contest-winners.htm. This manuscript also received a 5-star review from Readers' Favorite as well. What is amazing about this is that I won this award despite the fact that I had not had it edited by anyone, nor had it been read by others except for the reviewers and my daughter. You can read more about this award on my website book page at www.NancyJanke.com/books/ plus other news on my blog page at www.NancyJanke.com/blog-1/.


USE OF FUNDS

I am raising funds to self-publish my book as I do not have the funds to do so at this time. I have spent the last eight years passionately and tirelessly working full-time on myself while writing this book for other people who have gone through what I have (abuse victim, divorce, low self-esteem, rejection, toxic relationships). Thankfully, I have been transformed into a confident, determined, and passionate woman who is accepting, forgiving, and loving. 

In the past year, I have run out of money and am now staying with my ex-husband, which is not the best situation for me. But, it’s either that or living in my car or a homeless shelter.

I will be self-publishing Positive Choices = Positive Behavior as a paperback through either Create Space or Lightning Source plus have a Kindle version as well. In paying additional money for expanded distribution, my book will be available through book distributors and Barnes & Noble throughout the U.S. plus Canada and Europe.

▪  $900 Book Editor (I have borrowed a bit of money from a friend to use for hiring an editor so I can get this process started.)

▪  $399 Custom Book Cover

▪  $249 Author’s Advantage Interior

▪  $250 ISBN numbers for all book formats (paperback and digital)

▪  $25  Expanded Distribution

▪  $69  Kindle-ready conversion

▪  $500 Rewards (books/cards/envelopes/packing materials/shipping)

▪  $280 Indiegogo and credit card fees

▪  $2,680 Total

MY STORY
(Excerpt from Positive Choices = Positive Behavior: Choices That Affect Your Character, Life, and Relationships)
INTRODUCTION 


ACKNOWLEDGING MY PERSONAL CHOICES



Something snapped within me! I
felt extremely angry, broken, exhausted, frustrated, and scared. After more than 40 years of being a victim and taking abuse
from my family and husband, I finally came to a point where I had had
enough!  I needed a break!  Hadn't I suffered enough?  Something
had to change—soon! I cried out in desperation, “Please
God, help me! Someone please help me! I’m
so tired of being abused, especially by the people who are supposed to love me.
I need some serious help with my situation, God. I know You’ve always been
there for me and have my best interests at heart. Would You please show me how
to make my life better? I’ll do whatever it takes, God. Just please help me!
Thank you!” 

A
few days later my answer came to me as an “aha” moment: I can react and respond either negatively or positively to people or
situations. The choice is mine. Wow!
This “aha” moment triggered something deep within my soul. It was like a switch
that instantly turned my negative, oppressive outlook about my life into a
positive, promising one. I no longer felt totally overwhelmed with the painful
emotions concerning my husband, family members, other people, and myself. I
acknowledged that we all have the power of free will. I felt empowered to seize
the moment and take control of my life. This was the crucial turning point in
my life that prepared me to answer the questions of how and why I reacted and
responded negatively to people. This turning point also helped me realize why I
remained angry and bitter with these people who had offended me during the
course of my lifetime. 

ADDRESSING MY PERSONAL CHOICES


Besides feeling angry with, fearful of, and neglected
by my husband, family members, and certain other people, I felt powerless, unacceptable,
unforgivable, unloved, unwanted, and unworthy. Taking positive action and
addressing my personal choices,  I
recognized the significance of my negative and positive reactions (with body
language) and responses (with words) to people in various situations. Desiring to
make significant improvements in my life, I wrote regularly in a journal about my
negative reactions and
responses in respect to anger, criticism, fear, forgiveness,
love, personal power, rejection, and relationships. I analyzed the how and why of my past
negative reactions and responses plus looked at my choices from other people’s
point-of-view. I finally understood how my destructive behavioral patterns caused
the unfavorable outcomes of damaging my character, harming my quality of life,
and weakening my relationships. It was time for me to take responsibility for
the numerous negative choices I had made. After I started making more positive
choices, I found that I was able to put the past behind me, heal my emotional
wounds, and move forward with my life.
Exhibiting
courage, having an attitude of gratitude, and maintaining a sense of humor have
helped me behave toward people
and situations in a positive, reasonable, and respectful manner. I have confronted
and conquered my fears, managed my anger properly, and supported others. I now
accept, forgive, and love myself and others, in addition to giving love to
others and receiving love from them. My new constructive practice of positive
behavior has produced the favorable outcomes of enhancing my character,
improving my quality of life, and strengthening my relationships. 
My
life-changing “aha” moment and incredible journey of transformation, in
conjunction with drawing on my experiences, common sense, empathy, life
lessons, observations, and wisdom, serve as the basis for Positive
Choices = Positive Behavior: Choices that Affect Your Character, Life, and
Relationships. I’m not a mental health professional,
nor do I have a degree in communication, counseling, or psychology. What I do
know for sure is that my life purpose is to serve others through communication.
As an author, a mentor, and a speaker, my mission is:
• 
To plant the seeds of awareness in you
about your negative and positive choices
• 
To prompt you to work through the
consequences from your past reactions and responses and to make more positive
choices on a daily basis
• 
To suggest helpful, practical ways for
you to enhance your character, to improve your quality of life, and to
strengthen your relationships
Within
this self-help book, I share a few of my negative and positive choices in each
chapter along with the valuable life lessons I’ve learned from them. If I, an
average individual, can enhance my character, improve my quality of life, and
strengthen my relationships as a result of making more positive choices on a
daily basis, you can too. My intention is to be your mentor and inspire you to
work through your own personal issues in a constructive manner. In doing so,
this can pave the way for you to heal your emotional wounds regarding other
people’s habitual offensive behavior toward you, as well as your destructive
reactions and responses toward them. Deciding to accept and forgive yourself
and others can become a reality if that’s what you truly want. As a means of
encouragement during your journey of transformation, I will provide you
with some tools for confronting and conquering your fears, managing your anger properly, and supporting others. In addition, it is my hope to help
you deal with your relationships so you can open your heart to loving yourself
and others unconditionally. Together you and I can make a positive difference in this world! Are you interested?
Read on.

ASSESSING YOUR PERSONAL CHOICES
Positive
Choices = Positive Behavior
has two objectives. First, examine your negative reactions and responses to
others in general. Second, explore how you can make more positive choices and
behave more positively toward people instead. This self-help book covers topics
relating to your anger, criticism and support, fear, forgiveness, love,
personal power, rejection and acceptance, and relationships. It’s my desire to
encourage you in each chapter so you will feel empowered to make the commitment
to enhance your character, improve your quality of life, and strengthen your
relationships.
The vast majority of this self-help
book is about you and for you. Use your
own “aha” moments, common sense, life experiences, logic, and wisdom to assess
your personal choices and to learn more about your behavior. While working through this workbook, you may find
yourself at times basing your reactions and responses on your feelings.
Sometimes you may base them on your logic. Neither method is “right,” nor
“wrong.” The many “aha” moments you may experience as you read through this book could be felt on either an
emotional or intellectual level.

CHALLENGING YOUR PERSONAL CHOICES
Ask yourself how you feel or
what you think when someone reacts and responds negatively to another person or even to you. Would it be a wise move on your part to start behaving in a
more positive manner toward everyone? Imagine how making more good
choices on a daily basis could produce more favorable outcomes in your life. Are
you ready to do the necessary work to become
a stronger emotional, intellectual, and spiritual individual than you ever
imaged you could be? Millions of people around the world have done this. Yes,
you can do this too! I’m right here
to assist and to motivate you. How about we do this together? Today, make
positive choices! 




AWARD WINNER


Positive Choices =
Positive Behavior is a Bronze medal winner in the motivational category in the 2013 Readers’ Favorite
contest out of six finalists. Click on their link http://readersfavorite.com/2013-award-contest-winners.htm. This manuscript also received a 5-star review from
Readers' Favorite as well. What is amazing about this is that I won this award despite the
fact that I had not had it edited by anyone, nor had it been read by others
except for the reviewers and my daughter. You can read more about this award on
my website book page at www.NancyJanke.com/books/ plus other news on my blog page at www.NancyJanke.com/blog-1/.


USE OF FUNDS

I am
raising funds to self-publish my book as I do not have the funds to do so at
this time. I have spent the last eight years passionately and tirelessly working
full-time on myself while writing this book for other people who have gone
through what I have (abuse victim, divorce, low self-esteem, rejection, toxic
relationships). Thankfully, I have been transformed into a confident,
determined, and passionate woman who is accepting, forgiving, and loving. 
In the
past year, I have run out of money and am now staying with my ex-husband, which
is not the best situation for me. But, it’s either that or living in my car or
a homeless shelter.
I will
be self-publishing Positive
Choices = Positive Behavior as a paperback through either Create Space
or Lightning Source plus have a Kindle version as well. In paying additional
money for expanded distribution, my book will be available through book
distributors and Barnes & Noble throughout the U.S. plus Canada and Europe.

"DO WHAT YOU LOVE"

NOTE TO MUSICIANS: Great incentives for the study and creation of songs are on the right -- scroll down on the right-hand-side to check them out! -- LD

 

Non-Fiction Book & Audio Book by Larry Dvoskin

Since the age of 12, I have been loving making music. From the age of 15, I started earning money playing out.  At 18 I toured nationally behind 3 albums with a band on a major label, and I've been supporting myself in the business ever since.

Do What You Love -- the book and audio book -- will share my proven insights about creating lasting happiness, finding personal fulfillment, and living your dreams. 

Through high-tide and low, making both hits and ho-hummers's, I live my life relying on a set of keys -- the insights in Do What You Love -- that not only have made me happy, but countless dozens of people in my personal life as well who have been inspired, consoled, and driven by these hard-earned, but simply-stated, insights. 

DOES 'DO WHAT YOU LOVE' WORK?

For me, the proof is in the precious metals that hang in the form of records on my walls.  I've sold millions of songs as a coauthor, and earned enough trust in my field to work with the most respected performers in worldfrom most-recently Sony Records and MGMT, David Bowie, Van Halen vocalist Sammy Hagar, Sean Lennon, Bono's One.Org, Paul Doucette of Matchbox 20, Alec Baldwin, Al Jardine & Carl Wilson of The Beach Boys, Bad Company, to being signed by RCA, Capitol Records, EMI, Warner Chappell, Famous Music to touring opening for Queen, Chicago, Allman Brothers, Tom Petty and many others.

IS THIS LECTURE-Y OR FUN?

It's fun, purely.  My life and work has been about the momentum of spiritual fire.  I'm just here, my dear, to set you ablaze in the light of your best work on earth.

THE GOAL: $25,000 in 14 Days!

Words are cheap, but a good book is like a boat - without time and money, it stinks & sinks.

I'm not typing a demo book, I'm producing the real deal. The difference is night and day in terms of time, editing, layout, artwork, distribution, and even the publicity, promotion and marketing in order to really make this book sing. I want to get this to you in the clearest, best "book" of Me we can make.  It's gonna take guts, but also skill, time, and other experts in the work flow. Those experts cost.

HOW IS THIS PROJECT DIFFERENT? WHY IS IT IMPORTANT?

Once you jump in, this book is about us.  There will be a special chapter dedicated exclusively to reprinting your best insight (under 25 words, with your name) for doing what you love.  It'll be our shot heard 'round the world!

And together we'll celebrate at the release party, which is October 21, 2013.

WHY OCT 21st FOR BOOK RELEASE DATE?

My mom. I love my mother, profoundly, and the release date coincides with her birth-date in 1927. If I have loved music, life, and my friends and loved ones, it is her energy that I channel.

IF YOU CAN'T GIVE, PLEASE GIVE

Maybe now's not the right time for you, or you're a little cash-strapped for the bigger ticket items on the list that you'd otherwise like.  By sharing this page, you might well stumble across someone you'd never imagined, or even know personally, who is able to take advantage of the incredible prices on the goods and services I'm offering here. Share generally, but also specifically to someone who might have been waiting a long time for this to come by.  Or suggest it as a gift for someone to give for an early/late birthday, holiday present, engagement gift, or just a surprise.

North of $200 you'll be joining my circle of songwriting and musical collaborators who I care about as if they were my own family!

But how do you identify that budding songwriter?  It's those people who...

... may want to write a song and see their vision realized but don't know where to start, and felt that they would only be rewarded if they did *everything* themselves. (HINT: they will be massively rewarded by seeing their words supported in form and content, and seeing their vision realized in a way better than they'd dreamt of alone.)

... sing Karaoke like it's their last wish on death row but need to take the next step in singing something original. (We'll channel that rawness into something epic and unique for them... check out the incentives.)

... whose songs work for a little bit, and then 10 seconds later everyone in the room is so bored but they don't want to be rude so they say nothing as their "song" goes on sucking all the air out of the room, and you're left politely clapping and smiling saying, "that's nice", "gee, I didn't know 12 verses could be so different and yet... the same..." (Give the gift of knowing how to write really good songs, every time.)

... the person who loves songs but just wants to get closer to the "code" of songwriting (see my NYU class for just $200!)

... that teenager in a band that is already playing out who has passion and drive but needs to focus on just one great song that fits them well. (Everyone needs feedback and support.)

... those who in your heart truly believe this would open their heart to a profound professional or amateur opportunity to get something done in a way that they've always aspired to.

NOTE: Some of the incentives are location-sensitive - choose wisely.

HOOK IT UP!

If you know anyone who may be hesitant for any reason, send them my email: 

TodayIsTheFuture@Gmail.com. 

I'll happily address their concerns.

story:
Celestino antes del alba (1967) is Reinaldo Arenas’ first novel and only book he ever published in Cuba. Ediciones Unión printed the novel after it received a honourable mention in National Literary Contest Cirilo Villaverde in 1965. The novel was written while Arenas worked at the National Library. The Cuban artist Manuel Vidal designed the artwork for the edition of 2,000 copies. The book sold out in one week and it was never reprinted in Cuba, but due to its limited run “the author’s reputation was restricted to a small number of Cubans”. Arenas’ second novel, El mundo alucinante [Hallucinations] received another recognition at a national literary award but it was not printed due to rumours of Arena’s homosexuality  Arenas smuggled out of the island the manuscripts of Celestino antes del alba and El mundo alucinante that were published in France by Editions du Seuil, and the manuscript of Con los ojos cerrados that was published by Editorial Arca in Uruguay.

Arenas escaped Cuba in 1980 in the Mariel exodus after being in jail for over three years for false accusations of “child molestation” and for “publishing outside Cuba without the permission of the UNEAC”. Arenas was marginalized for his homosexuality and for defying the Revolution’s control on freedom of speech by publishing his books outside Cuba.

Arenas “attacks to the Cuban government were based on the policies against homosexuals in Cuba”. Later in exile he would become the most outspoken critic of the treatment of homosexuals during the Revolution. His legacy relies on his courageous accounts of repression during the 1960s and 1970s against homosexuals and freedom. Arenas’ literary voice is part of the new wave of intellectuals writing on homosexual subjects and Cuban literature but from the exile.

Your contribution will further my studies in this area and it will also be your birthday present.

Thanks,

David Fernández

story:
Update 3

Well, the IndieGoGo campaign is coming to an end, but there's still more than two days to go. It's been a great run so far and I'm very grateful for everybody who has contributed so far. For those of you and for the ones still on the edge I've got a set of new pictures. Part of the perks you can get for lending your support is a huge 33x23 inch map of the changed Europe in late 1940. And here's the template for it:

The final map you'll get includes front lines, battle dates, zones of occupation in different colors and a slightly yellow-ish touch to emulate old paper. The paper quality is very high.

Update 2

The $100 now also comes with a 23x33 inch (DIN A1) colored, artistic map of the altered Europe of 1940 for you to track the events of the story!

Update 1

You can follow the progress of CLASH of EAGLES directly here!

The Road So Far

Back in 2011 I published the first novel of my alternate history/WW2 series The Burning Ages, called Wolf Hunt to the acclaim of critics and fellow authors alike.

One of the best this year ... engaged me from the first page to the last. [Sift Book Reviews]

Terrific multi-genre fiction! [William P. Grasso, author of East Wind Returns]

First rate, action packed techno-thriller and alternate history. [Steven Konkoly, author of The Jakarta Pandemic]

Wolf Hunt is part technothriller, part alternate history in the style of John Birmingham's Axis of Time trilogy or Eric Flint's Ring of Fire. It explores, among others, social and historical themes like racism and guilt, featuring a wide range of actual historic figures, ranging from J. Edgar Hoover and F.D.R. to Adolf Hitler. And it ends with a radically altered year 1940.

If you like to find out more you can dig into some post here talking about the setting and the events of Book 1. And you can read the first 3 chapters under the tag "Samples" here.

Now Clash of Eagles starts where Wolf Hunt ended.

Adolf Hitler is dead. The Führer of Nazi Germany has been brought down by a bold attack, led by the mastermind of Germany's military intelligence organization, the Abwehr, Wilhelm Canaris. But Canaris did not act on his own. Soldiers - men and women - from the future, flung back in time by a strange tempest, fought at the conspirators' side. The course of history has been changed.
But not all is well.

The Nazis are shocked and battered, but far from beaten. Reinhard Heydrich, the head of the Nazi security apparatus and new self-proclaimed Reichsführer, is gathering his forces as occupied Europe finds itself cut in half, embroiled in a German civil war.

With Germany in disarray, Italy's fascist leaders are seeking glory and conquests of their own. Across the Channel, Churchill's Britain stands undefeated and defiant, confident that the time has come to turn the tides of this war.

And while the United States stands as a distant towering giant, with "Uptimers" of its own working to prepare it for the coming struggle, the realization of those in Germany that there is more than one devil (and he may come offering gifts) may just propell their fellowship into a precipice...

You can read the Prologue of Clash of Eagles here.


What can you expect of Clash of Eagles, and when can you expect it?

Action. Intrigue. Backstabbing. Drama. Awesome characters, both historic (Churchill, anyone?) and original. A consistent, plausible narrative taking the reality of the 1940s into account. And lots of dead Nazis.

I'm currently writing the novel and should be able to finish it this summer.

What you pay for:

Your contributions will help me pay for the three essential services that are necessary to turn Clash of Eagles into a published novel:
  1. Cover Art.
  2. In-book maps showing you what's happening where.
  3. Formating & setting up the novel for print.
  4. Editing.

Since "needs more editing" was pretty much the main complaint the early versions of Book 1 got this will be were the focus of my spending will be this time. A good editor will cost you an arm and a leg, but the finished book will be all the better for it. And since freelance editors usually calculate their rates by the words of the manuscript they are working on the largest part of the money will just have to go into the editing process.

Why? Well, let's just say Book 1 clocks in at 175K words and Book 2 won't be any thinner...

Obviously this will also cover the postage to mail out copies of the books and get you the extra perks you might have chosen.

What I can give you in return:

Actually, a rather wide range of things.
 
Take a look at the list of perks to your right. It ranges from exclusive versions of the Wolf Hunt (Book 1) ebook over paperbacks of both books and 1940s-style full color maps (23x33 inches / DIN A1) up to getting yourself perpetuated as an important character in Book 3.
 
And yes: every perk includes all the advantages of the prior perk.
 
And remember:
* It takes some time for the paperback of Clash of Eagles to be set up and approved. September 2012 is an estimate. It might be done earlier, but it may just as well take longer. Just sayin'.

***As for the Become part of The Burning Ages perk: naturally I can't promise that the character who gets your name reflects your personality. You may be a diplomat, an arms dealer, a spy, a soldier, or half a dozen other things! Only thing I can promise you is that you'll leave an impact!

An Indie Project

Everything about Clash of Eagles - the writing, the art, the editing - is done by the indie community. I'm an indie author. My editor is a freelancer. My cover artist and my map designer are freelancers operating from the depths of DeviantArt. The music was composed and the video was shot by yet another indie.

By supporting Clash of Eagles you don't just help me get a book published: you also support other very talented members of the indie community.

You're interested but can't contribute funds? No problem!

If you are unable to contribute to the campaign with money, please, spread the word.
 
Share the link to this page on Facebook.
 
Tweet it on Twitter.
 
Post it on your blog.
 
Email your peeps.
 
Talk to people.
 
Online funding depends on networks of interconnected humans. Please help this campaign by bringing it to the attention of others who may be interested in helping.
 
Thank you.
 
-- S. P. Breit
story_txt:
Update 3
Well, the IndieGoGo campaign is coming to an end, but there's still more than two days to go. It's been a great run so far and I'm very grateful for everybody who has contributed so far. For those of you and for the ones still on the edge I've got a set of new pictures. Part of the perks you can get for lending your support is a huge 33x23 inch map of the changed Europe in late 1940. And here's the template for it:

The final map you'll get includes front lines, battle dates, zones of occupation in different colors and a slightly yellow-ish touch to emulate old paper. The paper quality is very high. 
Update 2
The $100 now also comes with a 23x33 inch (DIN A1) colored, artistic map of the altered Europe of 1940 for you to track the events of the story!
Update 1
You can follow the progress of CLASH of EAGLES directly here!
The Road So Far
Back in 2011 I published the first novel of my alternate history/WW2 series The Burning Ages, called Wolf Hunt to the acclaim of critics and fellow authors alike.
One of the best this year ... engaged me from the first page to the last. [Sift Book Reviews]Terrific multi-genre fiction! [William P. Grasso, author of East Wind Returns]First rate, action packed techno-thriller and alternate history. [Steven Konkoly, author of The Jakarta Pandemic]
Wolf Hunt is part technothriller, part alternate history in the style of John Birmingham's Axis of Time trilogy or Eric Flint's Ring of Fire. It explores, among others, social and historical themes like racism and guilt, featuring a wide range of actual historic figures, ranging from J. Edgar Hoover and F.D.R. to Adolf Hitler. And it ends with a radically altered year 1940.
If you like to find out more you can dig into some post here talking about the setting and the events of Book 1. And you can read the first 3 chapters under the tag "Samples" here.
Now Clash of Eagles starts where Wolf Hunt ended.
Adolf Hitler is dead. The Führer of Nazi Germany has been brought down by a bold attack, led by the mastermind of Germany's military intelligence organization, the Abwehr, Wilhelm Canaris. But Canaris did not act on his own. Soldiers - men and women - from the future, flung back in time by a strange tempest, fought at the conspirators' side. The course of history has been changed.But not all is well.  The Nazis are shocked and battered, but far from beaten. Reinhard Heydrich, the head of the Nazi security apparatus and new self-proclaimed Reichsführer, is gathering his forces as occupied Europe finds itself cut in half, embroiled in a German civil war. With Germany in disarray, Italy's fascist leaders are seeking glory and conquests of their own. Across the Channel, Churchill's Britain stands undefeated and defiant, confident that the time has come to turn the tides of this war.
And while the United States stands as a distant towering giant, with "Uptimers" of its own working to prepare it for the coming struggle, the realization of those in Germany that there is more than one devil (and he may come offering gifts) may just propell their fellowship into a precipice...
You can read the Prologue of Clash of Eagles here.

What can you expect of Clash of Eagles, and when can you expect it?
Action. Intrigue. Backstabbing. Drama. Awesome characters, both historic (Churchill, anyone?) and original. A consistent, plausible narrative taking the reality of the 1940s into account. And lots of dead Nazis.
I'm currently writing the novel and should be able to finish it this summer.
What you pay for:

Your contributions will help me pay for the three essential services that are necessary to turn Clash of Eagles into a published novel:


Cover Art.
In-book maps showing you what's happening where.
Formating & setting up the novel for print.
Editing.

Since "needs more editing" was pretty much the main complaint the early versions of Book 1 got this will be were the focus of my spending will be this time. A good editor will cost you an arm and a leg, but the finished book will be all the better for it. And since freelance editors usually calculate their rates by the words of the manuscript they are working on the largest part of the money will just have to go into the editing process.
Why? Well, let's just say Book 1 clocks in at 175K words and Book 2 won't be any thinner...
Obviously this will also cover the postage to mail out copies of the books and get you the extra perks you might have chosen.

What I can give you in return:
Actually, a rather wide range of things. 

 
Take a look at the list of perks to your right. It ranges from exclusive versions of the Wolf Hunt (Book 1) ebook over paperbacks of both books and 1940s-style full color maps (23x33 inches / DIN A1) up to getting yourself perpetuated as an important character in Book 3.

story:
"In my darkest moment as I lay on deaths door step, Hope showed up in a miraculous way! - Troy Lewis

 

ï¿½Itï¿½s probably nothing serious, but you might want to get it checked outï¿½

These are the words that I heard from a nurse standing in my house in 1992. These words would act as the ï¿½seedï¿½ to this incredible story.

             I didnï¿½t know it then, but these words would lead to a defining moment in my life. A trial that I would be forced to go through. That would cause me to question who I was, all that I had believed, and God himself.

             I had played Jesus Christ in a passion drama for 9 years, the same drama that brought me to the Lord in 2001. I was also a successful girls fastpitch softball coach for 7 years, coaching girls from 10 & under all the way to the high school level. I work for a fire sprinkler contractor in Toledo, OH and have worked there for 20 years. I am married to a lovely lady and have 2 beautiful daughters.

But in 2010, I was left standing on the outside looking in, as I came to the realizationï¿½

ï¿½life as I knew it was overï¿½

I would begin a race against time to go on dialysis and get a kidney transplant as my kidneys began to shut down. Only to find out that the one thing that was supposed to keep me alive, was actually killing me. It wasnï¿½t till he delivered me through the valley of the shadow of death, through incredible odds and miraculous events. It was then that I realized ï¿½why this happened to meï¿½.

It was to write this book and to share with you, the hope of what I know to be true. In my darkest moment, as I lay on deaths door step. Hope showed up in a miraculous way! That is the same hope that is with you through all of your trials.

This story is not just about me. This story is your own as well. My battle was life and death as my kidneys began to shut down. Yours may have been another health issue, the loss of a loved one, the changing of a career, or some other trial that was unforeseen.

We all have a story to tell, your experience may be the inspiration that gives ï¿½Another 2nd Chanceï¿½ to someone else.

              Sometimes I look back over the things that happened and marvel at all of the incredible events that took place. Events that were taking place years earlier. Events taking place half way across the nation. These things had to fall into place to create this incredible story, all leading up to one main event in July of 2010.

 

"It was then that I realized those seeds that God had been dropping had blossomed into a beautiful reflection of my past. There was beauty in the broken path, joy in the suffering, and meaning in the journey."

              Just when I counted on a brothers Love to save me, it was a Fathers love that saved us both. A thousand miles away, a stranger stepped up and courageously gave with nothing expected in return.

             I could not have imagined what God had in store for all who were part of this story and Hollywood couldnï¿½t have scripted it. This is a story that is written in the lives of all involved by the sovereign creator of the universe.

This is Gods Story!

 **********************************************************************************************************************

"I'm so glad you are writing a book about this! This is one of the most God-involved true stories I have ever heard. May God bless this work!!"

-Barb Julian (Donor's Mom)

Pheonix, AZ

 ï¿½It was my privilege to get to hear Troyï¿½s story first hand ï¿½ and watch the Lord speak through him to our congregation that Sunday morning. As Troy would say, it really is ï¿½Godï¿½s storyï¿½ more than ï¿½Troyï¿½s storyï¿½ anyway! As a result of that Sunday morning interview, which was part of my message, I think we sold more sermon CDï¿½s that day than any day before or since. It truly is an amazing and inspiring story, and countless people have been moved and touched by it.ï¿½

-Pastor Scott Park

Impact Christian Church

Woodland Park, CO

"Troy's journey of illness, struggle and disappointment was the circumstance God used to reveal His power to work all things together for Troy's good and God's glory. His story inspires all of us not to give up."
-Pastor Bob Hinz
Bedford Alliance Church
Temperance, Michigan
"Whoever says miracles don't happen haven't met the Lewis brothers! This story is a perfect example of how a loving God is orchestrating his will in the lives of the men and women he created. Our physical bodies are not our own, but a temporary gift given to us for a higher purpose. Trust in the Lord with all your heart and he will direct your paths!
I am honored to have shared this story with Mid-Michigan."
-Jessica Harthorn, Television News Reporter
*******************************************************************************************************************


It is scheduled for the official release in January!

 

This project is currently being completed and still needs funding to be published!

Your much needed assistance will not only insure the publication of this book, but also help in the promoting of it. By helping fund this project, YOU will recieve a major perk! Even though the Official release isn't till January, you will be the first to recieve a book!!

I will have Author copies available just before Christmas to send to anyone that has contributed to the project!! They can even be sent out as Christmas presents if you would like!


*********************************************************************************************************************


IT SOUNDS GREAT! NOW WHAT?

By investing your money in "Another Second Chance" project you help it get printed and you also get some perks back. (*Please check Perks For Your Contribution on the right-side menu).

Things you might also like to know:

  • You can make your contribution by credit card, PayPal or check. If none of these work for you, please don't hesitate to drop me a line.
  • Contributions can be anonymous. This way, only the person running the campaign (me!) can view your name and contribution details.
  • You can pay with your credit card as a Guest on PayPal.
  • I will contact you regarding updates to the campaign and how to fulfill your perk. You will also receive a confirmation email.
See more details here.

 

WHERE THE COLLABORATION GOES TO

 

The money raised here will help cover the remaining costs involved in completing the project. I have tried to do as much as I could myself to reduce aditional costs; however, I'll still have other expenses like:

 

  • Editing & Proofreading
  • Publishing
  • Printing Costs
  • Packaging and Shipping
  • Web Design
  • Production of all other rewards

 

  • Any extra funds will go toward travel costs for speaking engagements, since I will be sharing this story with Churches, Organizations, and Special Events nationwide.

WHAT HAPPENS IF WE DON'T REACH THE GOAL

You'll get your rewards anyways!

I'm committed to making this project happen, which means that your investment is secure. During the campaign you'll be able to check out the project's news here at IndieGoGo or at the campaign blog. Your collaboration is essencial for reaching the goal!

 

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

So spread the word far and wide!! - Every other person who gets involved in this project because of YOU, doubles our chances to reach our goal.

Do it by Facebook, Twitter, blog, e-mail, letter, telephone: let that person who would enjoy "Another Second Chance" know about it. 

From $10 to $1,000 - each Dollar counts!

story:
We all love short stories. There is nothing better for the busy individual who loves to read (but has none of the time) to crack open a book, read an entire story in twenty pages and then put the book down. No wondering what is going to happen in that next chapter when you’re chained to your desk at work or in the middle of class. No daydreaming when you should be paying attention during that important meeting. 

 We know that pain. We both work for Universities, both have two jobs, and time is a precious thing. We decided to put together this anthology to not only capture the imagination of the working individual, but hopefully inspire the imaginations of readers of all ages.

What Is This Book About?

How would an immortal deal with the End Times? The world will inevitably come stumbling into apocalypse, and They will be there to witness it. We want to explore how myths, how fae creatures of all cultures, beings generally seen as eternal (or at least very long-lived) would cope with the end of the world around them. Be it through nuclear incident, religious fervor or rampaging zombies, we are going to discover just What Follows…

Who Is This Book For?

Everyone! Anyone who has ever enjoyed fantasy, horror and all the beautiful and subtle things that fall into the cracks between. Bear in mind some language might be strong for young audiences.

Who Is Participating?

We have invited an amazing group of authors to submit stories for this anthology. Fans of Fight Like a Girl (our first anthology project funded through Kickstarter) will recognize some names, and others are completely new! Among them are:

Joyce Chng
Wendy Gowins
Meg Belviso
JJ Kahrs
Kate Larking
E.V. O'Day
Crystal Sarakas
Chris Kocher
Sarah Lyn Eaton
Nina Waters
Ross Bennett
Leigh Allen
Gwenne Dawson

Cover Art by Zack Smith

And quite possibly you! If we reach 75% of our initial funding goal ($4,500) we will start accepting submissions for inclusion. More details on that will be posted when we reach that goal.


So Why an Indiegogo Campaign, And Why Should I Care? 

Many authors saw their first paid-publication with our last crowdfunding project through Kickstarter, Fight Like a Girl: A Short Story Anthology. Because of our backers’ generosity, we were successfully able to produce a fantastic book which received positive reviews. 

 Reviews for Fight Like a Girl: A Short Story Anthology

 “A wonderful anthology. It's rare for me to find a short story anthology where I like almost all of the stories - I think I only skipped/speed through two pieces here. A very good mix of stories. My favorite was probably the last story: "The Way of Sisters" by April Steenburgh, but there were quite a few engaging ones whose authors I will certainly be looking up. Overall a really impressive book.” -Kelly on goodreads.com 

 “I really enjoyed the stories. It is great to see an fantasy anthology by new female writers. I especially liked Leviathan's Bride.” -Sara Crofford on amazon.com 

“Great stories! I'm not even much of a fan of fantasy, but I really enjoyed this collection. I hope the authors keep writing.” -Kate Gowins on amazon.com 

We were able to assist twenty-two authors in getting paid for their craft, and we want to continue supporting these and other creative careers. As such, we want to again be able to pay our writers the industry standard rate of $0.05 per word for their work, plus front any costs publishing would accrue (including getting you your books should we make it to a print run!). 

 Anthologies are spectacular ways to get to know authors you would not run into otherwise, and are not published as often by the big publishing houses. Crowdfunding has made it possible for writers to get together with an idea and put together magnificent books. We have a group of skilled writers, and an amazing theme. All we need is the backing to make this happen.

The Campaign Itself

Our initial goal of $6,500 is set at what we would need to cover the cost of running the campaign (the amount Indiegogo takes from the total) and the amount it would take to make an ebook- the funds required to pay our authors ($0.05/word, our cover artist, shipping for tangibles, and cover any of the strange things that pop up along the way (a really amazing cover that took longer and thus cost more than anticipated, one or two slightly longer stories. One or two extra stories).

How much we are able to raise will directly affect how large of an anthology we are able to create (how many stories we can include).

We would also love to release a paperback, much like we did for 'Fight Like a Girl'. This requires more financial backing. If we can hit $9,600 we will be able to cover a print run and shipping (both from the printer and to our supporters), and would be able to offer that perk level to supporters.

Who are We?

April and Christy are life-long students and lovers of the written word. April is a librarian and freelance eBook formatter and editor. She is also a published author. Christy recently completed her Master’s Thesis and immediately jumped back into fiction. She has worked as a freelance graphic artist since 2005, specializing in print media and layouts.

If we can hit $9,600 we will be able to cover a print run and shipping (both from the printer and to our supporters), and would be able to offer that perk level to supporters.Who are We?April and Christy are life-long students and lovers of the written word. April is a librarian and freelance eBook formatter and editor. She is also a published author. Christy recently completed her Master’s Thesis and immediately jumped back into fiction. She has worked as a freelance graphic artist since 2005, specializing in print media and layouts.

story:
The planners are no longer available through this IndieGoGo fundraiser, but I didn't completely sell out, so they will be available in my shop at TudorFair.com in November. And thanks! 

Overview:



Hi! I'm Heather and I'm passionate about building peace and empathy through learning history. To that end, I've been podcasting on Tudor history since 2009 when I launched the Renaissance English History Podcast. Even before then, I built my first history website in 1998! In 2016 I created the Tudor Planner, which brings together all the awesome of a weekly/monthly diary with Tudor history. There's This Week in History, musical listening lists, quotes, all wrapped up in a gorgeous cover that looks like a manuscript.

 

The Basics About the Tudor Planner:

I'm passionate about planners myself, and am always checking out new ones. This planner incorporates planning elements that I love, in a layout that will be familiar, while also mixing in tons of Tudor history, in a style that resembles a manuscript.

  • The pages are 6x9 inches (close to an A5 size). The cover adds a bit of extra space, but doesn't hang out very much further (see photos for more detail).
  • The cover changes each year, but is always a Tudor period work, evoking the feel of 16th century England.
  • Dated Weekly and monthly layouts, the Tudor Planner runs from December 2020 to February 2022 so you can start to use it straight away, and it will carry you through planning early in the following year. 
  • End-of-month check in pages to keep you on track with your goals, and set the stage for a productive new month.
  • Plenty of notes pages, including dotted, lined, and plain.
  • Three pages of stickers.
  • Two sided pocket in the back to hold papers and notes.
  • All major holidays noted, as well as many Tudor feast days. Of course the Tudors lived through the Reformation (which manifested itself a little differently in England than in the rest of Europe) so the holidays our Tudor friends would have had in 1590 were different than in 1510. Still, the major and most popular ones are included.
  • Each week has an interesting Tudor fact that happened that week.
  • Music suggestions each month, and a link to a Spotify playlist so you can listen to Tallis while planning.
  • All planners shipped through this IndieGoGo fundraiser will include a signed thank you postcard.
  • Spiral binding allows the planner to lie flat.
  • High quality 120gsm Golden Sun Uncoated Woodfree paper
  • Shipped from Maryland, USA
  • Created with love by a writer who has been sharing stories about history online for over 22 years.
  • The Tudor Planner layouts run Monday to Sunday.

 

Benefits of being an early backer:
Of course there are intangibles - you'll have my deepest appreciation, and the good feeling that comes from supporting creative projects. But you'll also be among the first to receive the Tudor Planner when it arrives and ships. 

Plus, the cost of the Tudor Planner will go up considerably after this funding period is over. The retail price is $39.95, and it will stay there until I discount any that are left in March, 2021. 

Also, you'll guarantee that you get one. I print a limited amount, and previous years have sold out.

 

People Love the Tudor Planner!


 

Amazon reviews from previous years:


June 19 Quick Update (and stretch goals):

I'm completely blown away by the outpouring of support for the Tudor Planner, and I'm so incredibly grateful to everyone who supported the project so far! I wanted to add in a few stretch goals and bonuses as we enter the home stretch of the final 9 days! 

First off, if we hit $30,000 all backers, no matter what level, will receive several Tudor themed printable to-do lists and daily planners that you can print out at home (or use on your device). 

If we hit $35,000 all backers will also get a Tudor rose laptop sticker AND a pad of Tudor themed sticky notes. 

If you haven't yet shared the project, please do so, and let's smash the stretch goals! 


Meet Heather (aka the Backstory)

I've been writing and talking about history since 1991 when I started a summer job at a Revolutionary War museum when I was in high school. In 1998 I built my first history website, on Colonial America. And in 2009 I started the Renaissance English History Podcast, which makes it one of the longest continuously running indie history podcasts. Since then I've spoken about podcast community building at writers conferences, and at conferences including the Sound Education conference at Harvard.

In late 2016 I created the 2017 Tudor Planner,  which was a mix of two of my favorite things - Tudors and planning! It's a weekly/monthly planner that brings together history with planning - something that I definitely need as a busy mom with a young kiddo. I've always loved planners, since I bought my first Ziggy assignment book in 1989 - I color coded my assignments with Crayola skinny markers in Bold colors.

Here's the cover from the 2017 Tudor Planner - the very first one:

It was one of those things that I wanted to create basically so that I could buy it. I thought it would be fun, and I might sell a few dozen. But that first one was way more successful than I ever imagined, and for the 2018 one, I worked with a custom printer. I've been working with the same printer since then, and this year I'm updating the design, and adding more planning tools and stickers.

The Tudor Planner is a gorgeous book that will lead to people wandering by your desk just to check it out, and will cause spontaneous conversations whenever you take it out :)  Because each planner is a unique work of art. It's like having art, history, and planning all wrapped up in one. I mean, what else is there!?

This will be the 5th year that I've created the Tudor Planner, and I rely on these IndieGoGo fundraisers to pay for the printing and distribution - this is all an independent project that I do on my own - there is no publisher involved other than me. So I rely on your support to bring this planner to life each year. 

 

Why I'm Running this IndieGoGo (aka, the expenses)

The main expense for the Planner is printing.  But I am also updating the design of the pages this year, requiring the skill of a designer. Plus the cover image requires the purchase of a high res photo that can run into several hundred dollars, and a designer to make it all look great! Then there is warehousing the books at a location in Maryland, and that's where they are packaged and shipped from.

Every bit raised will be put towards that work, and the project will happen whether the goal is reached or not. 

The perks I'm offering include all kinds of great stuff, including a digital-only copy of the planner, a new activity book on the Six Wives, gift cards from my shop (TudorFair.com), a podcast episode on a topic of your choice, and tickets to the 2021 Tudorcon (plus the 2020 Virtual Tudorcon). The planners themselves will be shipped around the end of November, in time for the holidays. This is also the lowest price that the planner will be until I discount whatever is left in March of 2021. So hop on now to get the best deal, AND Tudorific perks!

The Impact (I mean, WHY does anyone want a Tudor Planner?):

I'm going to be totally honest here, and share that I actually considered not doing the Tudor Planner this year. The world seems like it's going crazy - between the economy and the pandemic, plus killer hornets thrown in on top of it all. I mean, is anybody even interested in getting a Tudor Planner right now? I thought that maybe I would skip this year entirely. But I polled some listeners, and people on my mailing list, and what I found was that yes, people actually did still want a Tudor Planner! And as I thought more about it, I became more excited.

Because maybe now is actually the best time for a Tudor Planner. Maybe now it's more important than ever to connect with the people of the past - especially the Tudors who endured summer after summer of plague and sweating sickness and economic uncertainty - and find within that our common humanity. Maybe now, in the midst of a pandemic and political arguments, now is the time to find ourselves in the people who came before, in their stories, and sew a connection that spans centuries. And by doing that, we might be able to sew deeper connections within our own communities. 

And then of course there's also the idea that when we manage our lives with a planner that helps keep everything organized, the chaos seems a little less scary. 

So yes, it's a crazy time, and because of that I'm also adding in a special perk I've never done before, the Digital perk for those who want to support the project and get a Tudor Planner of their own, but just don't have the budget for the full copy right now. That perk will receive a digital copy of the planner that can be printed out at home, or imported into a note taking app like GoodNotes. 

I always say that I'm a storyteller who makes history accessible because I believe it's a pathway to understanding who we are, our place in the universe, and being more deeply connected to our own humanity. And I try to do that in a physical way with the Tudor Planner each year. 

That sounds pretty heavy for a planner, right? Who knew that a planner could have such a deep meaning?  You just want to track your habits and remember your appointments. But for me, writing out our lives like that is actually kind of sacred, because who knows who will find it in several hundred years, and piece together stories of our own lives from the record we leave in our journals and calendars? 

A couple of bonuses:

Every backer will receive access to two short courses I did a few years ago on Kick@ss Women in Tudor England as well as Pregnancy and Childbirth in Medieval and Tudor England. Many of you will already have access to those when I sent them out to the mailing list earlier this year, but if you are new to me and my work, they have been really well received, and were incredibly interesting to research. I'll send out the link each week to new backers.

I'll also send you the list to all the videos of previous Tudor Summits that I did, starting back in 2017. These were online events that happened every six months for two years featuring leading Tudor authors and historians. I don't do them anymore because of my focus on Tudorcon planning, but there are over 35 talks filled with everything from visiting Tudor London to digging deeper into Mary Tudor. Again, once a week I'll send out a PDF with all the links to all backers. 
 

 

Risks & Challenges

This is the 5th time I've published a Tudor Planner, so things are a lot more clear now than they've been in the past, but there are always underlying risks. The printer could drop the ball, or the shipment could get delayed and stuck in customs. But since I'm using the same printer I've used for the past three years, and on pretty much the same schedule as before, I'm not anticipating any issues around that. 

Of course, if you're not happy with the planner, I will do my best to make it right for you. Last year we had more printing errors than normal, and when I asked the printer about it, they told me they had switched to a different plant because demand was high. They assured me that this year they will be back in the original plant, so those errors shouldn't happen. We did send replacement copies to anyone who found an error. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute (or you just don't really care about planners, but you want to support the podcast anyway) I would love any and all shares of this campaign! Let's get the word out to other Tudor history lovers - or planner lovers who also love history! - and let everyone know that the world just got a LOT more Tudorific, and they can add a dash of history to their lives every day of the year with the 2021 Tudor Planner!

Thank you so much for taking the time to consider supporting the Tudor Planner, and for those of you who do support it, I want to add an extra big Thank You. 

Yours in Tudor Love,
Heather

story:
Summon the Summary!

A blessing or a curse?

Trinia wakes up on her 16th birthday to find she can duplicate herself in mind and body, and the implications of her power spells doom for her people.

Her power-hungry father, Chieftain Caderyn, plans to use her gifts to create an army large enough to conquer the world, starting with her people. She goes on the run to seek out someone, anyone, who she can stand with to fight against him.

Deep in the Forest of Nex she finds Údar, a man of legend, who she hopes to convince to help her stop her father before it’s too late.

But when the ancient darkness of the Banshee Queen begins to rise and Trinia encounters far worse evil than her father, it becomes harder and harder to ignore the ancient prophecy that sealed her fate before she was even born.

That she will destroy the world.

About the Book

Hello everyone, my name is Stephen Howard, and I am the author of The City of Snow and Stars. When I sat down to write this book, it was supposed to be one book. I told myself I was going to keep things simple, nothing crazy like I had tried to do in the past... Now, it's a planned Trilogy. Least I can say is that I tried.

One reason I wrote this book is that, as a Christian, I’ve been faced with hard questions that I didn’t have answers for. Why does God let bad things happen? Why are people abused? What does it mean to follow God when everything is going wrong? Questions I've asked myself countless times and wanted to explore and discover for myself.

These are tough topics to address on a good day, let alone write them into a book! Funny thing was, the characters of Trinia, Údar, and others seemed to write themselves and I was just along for the ride. They each share a common hurt from my past, but the way they processed and handled it differently made them uniquely their own person. In the end, I found more of them in me than me in them.

I love these characters and have spent countless hours with them (they are a rowdy bunch) and now I get to share them with you. I hope that in reading this book you will discover the pieces of the flawed and broken characters who are looking for the answers in yourself the same as I did. Their story is our story in so many ways because the truth is this: we are all a little broken.

You will love this book if you enjoy characters that are relatable, broken, imperfect, and human. They are flawed in so many ways, each one searching for something and not knowing fully what it is. They want to be loved, cherished, powerful, perfect, successful and seen for their merits. They, like us all, seek to overcome the pains we’ve gone through and find something better.

The City of Snow and Stars speaks to young adults and those in their early to mid-twenties who want to grapple with why God lets bad things happen and how we can address not only our brokenness but reach out in love to those who are broken.

Ultimately, I hope that The City of Snow and Stars inspires reflection and fruitful dialogue, pressing into engaging questions that help us understand:

  • Why we cannot make it "going it alone"
  • How our brokenness comes in many different shapes
  • And how, in the end, God can bring forth beauty from pain

I really look forward to exploring these questions and beyond with my readers. Coming together and discussing God, abuse (be it physical, sexual, emotional, or mental), and slavery (human trafficking) in new ways that will change us all for the better.

 

Welcome to My World

The land of Wintenaeth is vast. Filled with majestic mountains, lush valleys, craggy shorelines, and wild forests, and is called home to no less than five kingdoms. It's a land filled with variety, bounty, and promise. A land where all peoples share in the magic and power gifted to them by Elohai, though now seldom use it. 

But it was not always so. Ruins from bygone eras rise from the mists in each of the five kingdoms, a reminder to the brutal past under the reign of the Airgid Empire over a thousand years ago. A time when darkness held the land captive.

After the fall of the Empire, the kingdoms rose to take their place:

- Canamor claimed the northeastern section of the Empire, from the Forest of Nex to the sea. It is slightly more advanced in its armor and weapons than any other kingdom, but lacks adequate farming and relies heavily on the sea. 

- Thydu claimed the northwestern portion of the Empire, and are a more hardy people. Known for their prowess with horses, it is their primary source of trade and extremely lucrative.

- Ungaar beat the others in claiming the heart of the fertile lands that once kept the Empire fed. Populated mainly by farmers, the kingdom is not defenseless as it boasts Qepho City, home of The Academy of Mages. Combined with their sheer numbers, Ungaar is quite the force to be reckoned with and is by far the most powerful of the kingdoms.

- X'phos made up the southern border of the Airgid Empire and is made up of free peoples who serve no one. Their strength is in the community and their wealth in the vine. It is also the homeland of the Iomliad, a people with shape-shifting abilities unique only to them.

The world is rich with cultures, peoples, and places, and I am so excited to share each of them with you all!

 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:
 
  • The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in December, 2020 (even editors need editing)
  • The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder! (Although they look pretty sweet)
  • The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats) (You want to be able to read it)
  • The Copyediting for My Book - to make help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication (because gooder grammar doesn't cut it)
  • The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this Christmas season. (because my team is awesome)
When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition and an audiobook. (Do you know how bad I want the audiobook? I built a vocal booth in my office and I have pics as proof.)

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:
 
  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish
  • A Personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book
  • A full-color map of the world I'm building
  • Your Name will appear in a Special, Acknowledgements Section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)
  • Early access to the Authors Note of my Book and some additional sections of my manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback
  • The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover
  • I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share experience the experiences of writing my book
  • And more...

 

About the Author

Stephen Howard is an author, Developmental Editor, and Story Coach running his own business, The Editing Bard. As passionate as he is about writing his book, Stephen started his business with the goal of helping others achieve their publishing dreams and put their best books forward.

In 2016, Stephen had a number of suppressed trauma memories resurface, which led him to ask God why He’d let it all happen. Over the years, and with a lot of therapy, God finally gave him a personalized answer that helped not only heal from the abuses, but showed how He was using it to bring healing to others.

To be frank, Stephen has some serious control issues, swears way too much, is obsessed with Lord of the Rings, and can quote half the movie (okay, maybe this isn’t so bad)... The point is, he’s very much like the characters in his book (whispers: he’s got issues, shhh) and is on the same journey they are.

For more information you can connect with Stephen at sdhowardauthor@gmail.com and on Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, LinkedIn, Instagram, and Pinterest.

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family, and network. Please use #CityofSnowandStars and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts.

You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page

Please share my book to 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media. It's more personal and none of like spam! (be it meat or tags)
